results.title: Metformin-Induced Eosinophilic Interstitial Lung Disease
results.text_hl: We report a rare case of a 64-year-old male who presented with progressive @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@ while he was on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: Alyami SM, Alrasheed SK, Albogami BA. Metformin-Induced Eosinophilic Interstitial Lung Disease Cureus. 2023 Apr;15(4):e38339. PMID: 37261145
citations.BibTeX: @article{37261145, title={Metformin-Induced Eosinophilic Interstitial Lung Disease}, author={Alyami SM and Alrasheed SK and Albogami BA}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={4}, pages={e38339}}

results.title: Metformin Treatment: A Potential Cause of Megaloblastic Anemia in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: We bring to your attention, the case of a 62 years old @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ diagnosed with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus@@@ in 2015 that presented in the emergency room in October 2019 with an altered general condition, @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@palpitation@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@. Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was initiated from the diagnosis of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus@@@, four years before.

citations.NLM: Albai O, Timar B, Paun DL, Sima A, Roman D, Timar R. Metformin Treatment: A Potential Cause of Megaloblastic Anemia in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Diabetes Metab Syndr Obes. 2020;13():3873-3878. PMID: 33116733
citations.BibTeX: @article{33116733, title={Metformin Treatment: A Potential Cause of Megaloblastic Anemia in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus}, author={Albai O and Timar B and Paun DL and Sima A and Roman D and Timar R}, journal={Diabetes Metab Syndr Obes}, volume={13}, pages={3873-3878}}

results.title: Prehospital Diagnosis of Shortness of Breath Caused by Profound Metformin-Associated Metabolic Acidosis
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@Shortness of breath@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@SOB@@@) is one of the most common complaints among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in prehospital emergency medicine.

citations.NLM: Fubini PE, Suppan L. Prehospital Diagnosis of Shortness of Breath Caused by Profound Metformin-Associated Metabolic Acidosis Healthcare (Basel). 2021 Jan 14;9(1):. PMID: 33466796
citations.BibTeX: @article{33466796, title={Prehospital Diagnosis of Shortness of Breath Caused by Profound Metformin-Associated Metabolic Acidosis}, author={Fubini PE and Suppan L}, journal={Healthcare (Basel)}, volume={9}, number={1}}

results.title: Bilateral Ureteral Obstruction Causing Acute Kidney Injury and Resultant Metformin Toxicity
results.text_hl: A 55-year-old male with a past medical history of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ presented to the emergency department (ED) due to @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@shortness of breath@@@ and three days of @DISEASE_Back_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D001416 @@@lumbar back pain@@@.

citations.NLM: Rashid U, Marra EM, Tran VH. Bilateral Ureteral Obstruction Causing Acute Kidney Injury and Resultant Metformin Toxicity Cureus. 2021 Nov;13(11):e19635. PMID: 34956761
citations.BibTeX: @article{34956761, title={Bilateral Ureteral Obstruction Causing Acute Kidney Injury and Resultant Metformin Toxicity}, author={Rashid U and Marra EM and Tran VH}, journal={Cureus}, volume={13}, number={11}, pages={e19635}}

results.title: A Case of Diabetic Ketoacidosis in a Patient on an SGLT2 Inhibitor and a Ketogenic Diet: A Critical Trio Not to Be Missed
results.text_hl: A 47-year-old male with a history of poorly controlled T2DM on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@ presented to the emergency department (ED) with several days of @DISEASE_Pharyngitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010612 @@@pharyngitis@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@emesis@@@, @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, and @DISEASE_Anorexia @DISEASE_MESH:D000855 @@@anorexia@@@.

citations.NLM: Steinmetz-Wood S, Gilbert M, Menson K. A Case of Diabetic Ketoacidosis in a Patient on an SGLT2 Inhibitor and a Ketogenic Diet: A Critical Trio Not to Be Missed Case Rep Endocrinol. 2020;2020():8832833. PMID: 32855828
citations.BibTeX: @article{32855828, title={A Case of Diabetic Ketoacidosis in a Patient on an SGLT2 Inhibitor and a Ketogenic Diet: A Critical Trio Not to Be Missed}, author={Steinmetz-Wood S and Gilbert M and Menson K}, journal={Case Rep Endocrinol}, volume={2020}, pages={8832833}}

results.title: COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report.
results.text_hl: Seventeen years prior, she was diagnosed with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ 1.5 g twice a day and @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@ 10 mg twice a day were part of her therapy regimen.

citations.NLM: Bereda G. COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report. Ann Med Surg (Lond). 2024 Dec;86(12):7318-7321. PMID: 39649935
citations.BibTeX: @article{39649935, title={COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report.}, author={Bereda G}, journal={Ann Med Surg (Lond)}, volume={86}, number={12}, pages={7318-7321}}

results.title: Fatal hemolytic anemia associated with metformin: A case report
results.text_hl: Fatal @DISEASE_Anemia_Hemolytic @DISEASE_MESH:D000743 @@@hemolytic anemia@@@ associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@: A case report

citations.NLM: Packer CD, Hornick TR, Augustine SA. Fatal hemolytic anemia associated with metformin: A case report J Med Case Rep. 2008 Sep 10;2():300. PMID: 18783609

results.title: [A clinical case of lactic acidosis development in a diabetic patient taking metformin].
results.text_hl: After the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@'s vital signs, @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood sugar@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ levels were stabilized; his treatment regimen was arranged again and the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was discharged on day 4 of his admission. @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@Dyspnea@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@, and @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@ seen in the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ were thought to be due to @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ which may rarely occur when @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is used.

citations.NLM: Cezur M, Celmen N, Cetinbas R, Badalov P, Erdemli O. [A clinical case of lactic acidosis development in a diabetic patient taking metformin]. Anesteziol Reanimatol. 2009 Mar-Apr;(2):74-6. PMID: 19514447
citations.BibTeX: @article{19514447, title={[A clinical case of lactic acidosis development in a diabetic patient taking metformin].}, author={Cezur M and Celmen N and Cetinbas R and Badalov P and Erdemli O}, journal={Anesteziol Reanimatol}, number={2}, pages={74-6}}

results.title: [A clinical case of development of lactic acid acidosis in a diabetic patient taking metformin].
results.text_hl: By determining a new treatment regimen, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was discharged from the intensive care unit. @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@Dyspnea@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@, and @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@ developed in the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ resulted from @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ caused by the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Cesur M, Cekmen N, Cetinbas RR, Badalov P, Erdemli O. [A clinical case of development of lactic acid acidosis in a diabetic patient taking metformin]. Anesteziol Reanimatol. 2006 Mar-Apr;(2):65-7. PMID: 16758949
citations.BibTeX: @article{16758949, title={[A clinical case of development of lactic acid acidosis in a diabetic patient taking metformin].}, author={Cesur M and Cekmen N and Cetinbas RR and Badalov P and Erdemli O}, journal={Anesteziol Reanimatol}, number={2}, pages={65-7}}

results.title: A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci.
results.text_hl: CASE PRESENTATION: A 58-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@, @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Heart_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D011660 @@@cor pulmonale@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ had a productive @DISEASE_Cough @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@cough@@@ of greenish and purulent sputum, low-grade @DISEASE_Fever @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@shortness of breath@@@. Medications were @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Cholecalciferol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002762 @@@cholecalciferol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Folic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005492 @@@folic acid@@@, a multivitamin, @CHEMICAL_Fluticasone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068298 @@@fluticasone@@@ by inhalation, and, as needed, @CHEMICAL_Ipratropium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009241 @@@ipratropium@@@ by inhalation.

citations.NLM: Famularo G, Sordillo P, Stasolla A, Parisi MG. A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci. Chest. 2017 Oct;152(4):e95-e97. PMID: 28991556
citations.BibTeX: @article{28991556, title={A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci.}, author={Famularo G and Sordillo P and Stasolla A and Parisi MG}, journal={Chest}, volume={152}, number={4}, pages={e95-e97}}
